bin_packing.task_description: packing objects into the box called bin.

goals.1: Storing all objects in the container.
goals.2: If there is a white and soft object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: don't pick and place a box called bin
rules.2: when fold a object, the object must be foldable
rules.3: when place a rigid objects in the bin, the soft objects must be in the bin before
